name: Shrooms (itch) (TehCupcakes, Phantomhawk, TheNoteWeaver)
description:
Description

Grow and defend your mushroom colony by setting shrooms to destroy all who attempt to feed off your precious Golden Shrooms! Place your shrooms to defend your home. Collect enemy dropped nutrients and grow your colony from 1 Golden Shroom to 10 in order to achieve ultimate victory! Lose all your Golden Shrooms and taste defeat!

Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023.

GGJ Page

Controls
  • WASD / Minimap - Pan camera
  • Hold shift while panning to increase speed
  • Click and drag mushrooms to place
  • Enter - Start/Pause
  • Alt + Enter - Switch between windowed and fullscreen
Credits
  • Michael Kirkpatrick - Game Designer, Programmer
  • Austin Huebner - Game Designer, Programmer, Pixel Artist
  • Alex Rodriguez - Game Designer, Producer
  • Jeffrey Lynne - Game Designer, Tester
  • Clayton Belcher - Logo Artist
  • Ian Paul - Pixel Artist
  • Elizabeth Jetter - Sound Consultant
